home.description: For this grand celebration of love, we kindly request that you embrace the elegance of the occasion by wearing formal attire.
home.title: Dress Code

ageLimit.answer: There's no age limit for children. We want the whole family to be a part of our special day, from the littlest ones to the oldest.
ageLimit.question: Is there a specific age limit for children attending?

welcome.answer: Absolutely! We welcome children and have arranged for a designated kids' area with entertainment to ensure they have a great time during the celebration.
welcome.question: Are children welcome at the wedding?

colors.answer: No, there are no specific color requirements. Feel free to express your personal style and wear colors that make you feel comfortable and confident.
colors.question: Are specific colors required for the dress code?

meaning.answer: Formal attire typically includes elegant gowns, suits, tuxedos, or cocktail dresses. Think of it as dressing for a special occasion, similar to what you might wear to a sophisticated evening event.
meaning.question: What does 'formal attire' mean?

dietary.answer: Yes, we're committed to ensuring that all our guests have a delightful dining experience. We offer vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free food options. Please indicate your dietary preferences in your RSVP, and we'll make sure you're catered to accordingly.
dietary.question: Do you accommodate dietary restrictions?

requests.answer: While we'll have a variety of dishes to accommodate different dietary needs, if you have specific requests or severe allergies, please let us know in advance, and we'll do our best to accommodate them.
requests.question: Can we request specific dishes for dietary restrictions?

content.text1: Our journey began like any other day. Two paths converging at the crossroads of life. In a city filled with countless faces, it was a seemingly ordinary moment that sparked our extraordinary love story.
content.text2: Our love story wouldn't be complete without mentioning our two loyal Dalmatian dogs, Max and Bella. They've been with us through thick and thin, bringing joy and laughter to our lives with their spots and wagging tails.
content.text3: Together, we faced life's challenges head-on, learning from each obstacle and celebrating each triumph. Our love and bond only grew stronger with time.
content.text4: Today, as we stand on the precipice of our new chapter, we are excited to write the rest of our story together. Our love has deepened, our adventures have multiplied, and our hearts are forever entwined.
